name: Skull Shrine
description:
A 3D-ish bullet hell game about a witch and an evil shrine
There's a lot of stuff I couldn't get to work in time (like the walls and better movement) I had like only 2 days

Controls:

Move: WASD
Aim: Mouse
Use Bomb: Space
Walk Slow: Shift

Assets:

Music 1 , Music 2
Library
